scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises oversized materials belonging to John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky, including letters, account statements, a receipt, and a bill of sale, copies of which are stored in Box 2, Folders 8 and 9 along with other materials from 1799. The bill of sale documents Esther, a Black woman enslaved for life, being sold by Nathaniel Barker to her enslaver, John Wesley Hunt, for 75 pounds (July 13, 1799).
